intermittent hztest failures that we've been seeing for cameras.

summary.raw:
General test cleanup.

Make all atlas_utils tests conditioned on having a GPU.  Don't know another way
to do reliable time-based testing.

Adjust publication rates on hz tests to be at the targets plus 10Hz error.

Downgrade a bunch of info messages to warnings.
summary.html:
General test cleanup.

Make all atlas_utils tests conditioned on having a GPU. Don't know another way
to do reliable time-based testing.

Adjust publication rates on hz tests to be at the targets plus 10Hz error.

Downgrade a bunch of info messages to warnings.

values.message:
